title: Update admin credentials and add sign-in flow to admin panel

requirements.text: Change admin login credentials to username 'USER' and password 'PASS' in the authentication system

quotes: ab admin ka user name me USER  rakho aur pass me PASS  rakho

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can successfully log in using username 'USER' and password 'PASS'
Credentials are validated correctly in the useAdminAuth hook

requirements.text: Implement a sign-in process that requires authentication before accessing the admin panel

quotes: jab user login kare tab sing in prosses hona chahiye

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel is protected and cannot be accessed without signing in
Users are redirected to login form when attempting to access admin panel without authentication
After successful login, admin is automatically navigated to the admin panel

requirements.text: Ensure the admin panel displays all settings and all received appointments after successful login

quotes: fir admin ko admin panel me le jana chahiye jis se admin sare settings aur aayi hui apointment ko dekh sake

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel shows a complete list of all appointments that have been received
Admin can view all relevant settings in the admin panel
Appointment data loads correctly after admin authentication
No authorization errors occur when viewing appointments

constraints: Do not modify the backend authentication logic or schema
Keep the existing Internet Identity integration intact
Maintain the current appointment data structure and query hooks
nonGoals: Creating new appointment features beyond viewing
Adding role-based permissions beyond admin access
Implementing password reset or recovery functionality
